mapped_node_name.description: The name of the taxonomy node named in the node_id field

provenance.description: A list in which each entry is either an ORCID or the DOI of a supporting publication."

evidence_comment.description: A free text description of the evidence supporting this mapping. If a similarity_score is include, please also include details of how this was calculated.

similarity_score.description: Some score recording the similarity between mapped nodes.

name.description: Another name for this cell type.  Do not use terms here that are much narrower or broader than the cell type being described.

provenance.description: A DOI supporting the use of this synonym for this cell type, or failing that, an ORCID

id.description: An ontology term ID (following OBO curie style, e.g.: CL:0000100)

name.description: The label of the ontology term refered to by the id.

evidence_comment.description: A free text comment describing the evidence supporting annotation of this node with this ontology term.

supporting_data.description: A URL linking to data supporting this annotation.

node_id.description: Node identifier. This field should be programatically assigned, not edited.

cell_type_name.description: The primary name/symbol to be used for the cell type.

parent_node_id.description: ID of parent node. This field should be programatically assigned, not edited.

classification.description: One or more cell ontology terms that classify the cell type defined by this node.

location.description: A list of locations in which the cell type defined by this node is found, and (optionally), links to the evidence supporting this.
